title: Seriously premades are super abusive

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Salty Mc Feed,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8ZWq5FAA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-08T21:47:09.268+0000)
>
> Some are... true, they can't be reasoned with and they will report you. Then again you also throw around the report threats and toxic this toxic that. They are like you and Riot convinced you all that the game will be better if you report each other. You wanted a higher authority to take your player freedom, you got it.
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
> 
> Nobody should be punished for this irrelevant chatter.

Yes, but you dont get to read the stuff they were saying...

Hmm, honestly aside from the report calling at the end and the "im not crying ur unranked" near the start there's nothing here that stands out to me as being punishable. Are you sure this is the only game and your Reform Card and that you're not leaving out anything from it? I ask this because only one report is needed to flag a game for review, and premades don't have the power to autoban someone. Not only that but people have been known to lie about and/or even edit their Reform Cards to make it look less serious than it actually is, so either this is a rare false positive, the IFS showed the wrong game or there's something you're not telling us.

P.S. Everyone is responsible for their own behavior, and the "they started it/were worse" excuse doesn't work here.

It was fine at first, but you bombed it at the end with

"VirtSCP: plz report leo for verbal abuse"

That alone. Sorry buddy, never ever say anything suggesting you will or ask for reports. Circumstances don't matter with the current system. Sorry.
